Texts.Chs: 干得好，现在有了我们需要的一切材料，我们就可以来酿一瓶酒香四溢的瓦特酒了。
Texts.Eng: Nice. Now we have everything we need to make a delicious wartwine.
Use some ^orange;Grapes^reset; and a ^orange;Bottle^reset; in the ^orange;Fruit Press^reset; to make ^orange;Grape Mash^reset;. You'll want two units of it for the wine you'll be making.
